import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-autos-admin', templateUrl: './autos-admin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./autos-admin.component.css'] }) export class AutosAdminComponent { mostrarFormulario: boolean = false; toggleFormulario() { this.mostrarFormulario = !this.mostrarFormulario; } }
